text: Ndipo iwo amene anali kukhumbira chuma chake chadzulo adayamba kunena kuti, “Taonani! Mulungu amapereka moolowa manja kwa aliyense amene wamufuna ndi monyalapsa kwa aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Akadakhala kuti sadatilangize ife chisoni chake, Iye akadalamulira nthaka kuti itimeze. Taonani! anthu okana Mulungu sadzakhala opambana ngakhale pang’ono.”
